did-auth.scan: Scan QR code using your SSI Identity wallet on your smartphone.
did-auth.download1: If you don't have any SSI Identity wallet on your phone,
did-auth.download2: click here to install the KRAKEN wallet app for Android.

issue-diploma.scan: Check your wallet on your smartphone for your diploma credential.

issue-grades.scan: Check your wallet on your smartphone for your course grade credential.
